price: روزى كه نیرنگشان سودمند نخواهد بود و [از هیچ سو] یارى نمی‌شوند.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī ʿanhum kayduhum shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
